channel.title: How do you make an area "Non-PK"
channel.description: Ok, my ::home area is a PK area. And people won't stop PKing my newcomers. Is there a way I can make it where you can't PK?

item.title: How do you make an area "Non-PK"
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

A question nobody can solve? lets go through it one more time… console u have emote tabs, some of the emote tabs are used for commands… like case 168 is for (pk) to tele x y cord

so heres my thing i made the command (wars) but atm u can only type ::wars to tele there… So how do i make a new command tab/emote?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make an area "Non-PK"
